name: StarTower -STAGE PROTOTYPE
description:
Welcome to the StarTower. It's still under construction.

Introducing the debut project from Team Fuzzy Tail (MeltingComet, MrHatmadder), a simplistic emotional top-down dungeon crawling RPG shooter set on a short number of floors. Fight your way through all sorts of enemies, traps to build an arsenal of fearsome weapons and reach the top of the amazing StarTower.

This is a prototype of this project, and based on feedback will be adjusted in it's final release (graphics, sound design/music, etc.) Enjoy our Stage Prototype!

Note: Yes, we are aware of the fact that the game may be flagged as a virus. It isn't, we promise.

Prototype Features

- Play through the first few levels of the game!

- Fight back with 3 different weapons!

- Build up massive scoring combos and achieve high scores!

- Basic Player and Weapon Leveling!

- Listen to 2 tracks of the official soundtrack from Erick "RichardConaway" S.

- Experience tons of sh**** bugs!

Final Features!

- An engaging action shoot-em-up with emotion!

- Ascend a labyrinth-like tower tons of tight corridors to shoot your way through!

- Build an arsenal of over 9+ weapons and level up to be a fearsome foe!

- Level up both yourself and your weapons.

- Fight to the tunes of Erick "RichardConaway" S.'s chiptune-themed original soundtrack!

- Connect to GameJolt and compete in online leaderboards, plus achievements!
